roleset.name: put into a specific mental state (us. excitment or gullibility)

role.descr: entity whose mental state is affected

roleset.note: Added by Julia based on Call Home. No VNcls.

example.name: Rare transitive.
example.text: Of course I psyched him by telling him that nobody serves crumpets with mascarpone (oh, heaven!) and blueberry preserves .
example.arg: by telling him that nobody serves crumpets with mascarpone (oh, heaven!) and bluebery preserves

example.name: passive, args 1 and 2
example.text: I-1 really tried [*trace*-1]-2to get psyched *trace*-2 myself to do it
example.note: Make sure passives are in a VP node and are followed by the appropriate trace for arg1. If not, .ER!

example.name: Oh Boy. different arg2.
example.text: We-1 're super psyched *trace*-1 about the new “Add to foursquare” button that The Wall Street Journal is rolling out today!
example.arg: about the new "Add to foursquare" button that The Wall Street Journal is rolling out today
